channeldata.description: Green - A clean, colorful, fast python test runner. Features -------- - **Clean** - Low redundancy in output. Result statistics for each test is vertically aligned. - **Colorful** - Terminal output makes good use of color when the terminal supports it. - **Fast** - Tests run in independent processes.  (One per processor by default.  Does *not* play nicely with `gevent`) - **Powerful** - Multi-target + auto-discovery. - **Traditional** - Use the normal `unittest` classes and methods for your unit tests. - **Descriptive** - Multiple verbosity levels, from just dots to full docstring output. - **Convenient** - Bash-completion and ZSH-completion of options and test targets. - **Thorough** - Built-in, optional integration with   [coverage](http://nedbatchelder.com/code/coverage/). - **Embedded** - Can be run with a setup command without in-site installation. - **Modern** - Supports Python 2.7, and 3.4+. Additionally, [PyPy](http://pypy.org) is supported on a best-effort basis. - **Portable** - macOS, Linux, and BSDs are fully supported.  Windows is supported on a best-effort basis. - **Living** - This project grows and changes.  See the
channeldata.summary: Green is a clean, colorful, fast python test runner
